archetype: pure playmaking point guard with average size, high IQ, strong PnR control, historically streaky 3P shooter
summary: Floor general tip plejmejkera koji pre svega organizuje napad, jako dobar u pick-and-rollu i kreaciji za druge, šut za tri istorijski slabiji ali u UCF fazi pokazuje napredak. Može da vodi ozbiljan tim u ligama gde se više ceni playmaking i IQ nego ekstremna atletika.

primary_ways_of_scoring: catch-and-shoot threes when defenders go under
offense_profile.shot_creation: More of a playmaker than pure scorer; can create his own shot out of PnR and against closeouts but prefers to set up teammates.
offense_profile.pnr_usage: High PnR volume; comfortable reading tag defender, hitting roller and weak-side shooter. Very good tempo control as handler.
offense_profile.finishing_at_rim: Capable finisher with craft and floaters but not elite vs long rim protectors.

shooting_details.three_point: Functionally acceptable if left open; development area is volume and consistency more than touch.
shooting_details.midrange: Solid pull-up threat when defenders go under screens.

defense_profile.on_ball: Solid POA defender vs most college guards; not a lockdown athlete but competes and uses IQ.
defense_profile.off_ball: Understands rotations, tags roller, can stunt and recover. More reliable than flashy.
defense_profile.switch_ability: Best vs 1s and some 2s; struggles switching up to bigger wings.
defense_profile.playmaking_defense: Some steals by reading passes, not a gambling type.

strengths: High-level pick-and-roll decision making
True floor general mentality and game management
High assist numbers with good AST/TO ratio
Gets to the line and hits FTs at solid rate
Adaptable – uspešno se uklopio u više programa tokom karijere
weaknesses: Historijski ispodprosečan šut za tri na većem volumenu
Nema elitnu veličinu ni eksplozivnost za pro nivo
Nije prirodni high-volume scorer
Finishing kroz duge i fizičke rim protectore je limitiran

development_projection.months_12: Stabilan 10–12 PPG i 7–8 APG PG na college nivou, sa šutem za tri oko 34–35% na boljem volumenu.
development_projection.months_24: Početak profesionalne karijere kao startni ili glavni rotacioni PG u srednje jakim evropskim ligama, sa reputacijom pouzdanog organizatora.
development_projection.months_36: Potencijalno high-level floor general u ligama tipa ABA, Poljska, Belgija/Holandija, možda BCL nivo ako šut ostane 35–37% i zadrži kontrolu nad igrom.

best_systems: Structured halfcourt offenses with heavy pick-and-roll usage
Teams with good shooters around him to punish his PnR reads
Coaches who cene disciplinu i kontrolu ritma
poor_fits: Teams that require PG to be primary 18–20 PPG scorer
Switch-heavy defenses where his size is big liability
Chaotic, low-spacing systems bez jasne PnR strukture

archetype: elite high-IQ point guard and shooter, undersized but very skilled PnR maestro
summary: Jedan od najkompletnijih plejmejkera u NCAA: vrhunski šuter, elitni pick-and-roll decision-maker, vrlo visok košarkaški IQ. Nizak, ali čvrst. Prototip evropskog organizatora za visok nivo, uz ograničenja u odbrani zbog visine.

primary_ways_of_scoring: high-volume three-point shooting, both catch-and-shoot and off-the-dribble
craft finishes and floaters in the lane
offense_profile.shot_creation: Very good at creating his own jumper with change of pace and PnR usage; not an isolation athlete but elite in structured actions.
offense_profile.pnr_usage: One of the best PnR handlers in college; reads tags, weak side and drop coverage at near-pro level.
offense_profile.finishing_at_rim: Below-the-rim finisher who relies on angles, craft and timing; good but not elite vs length.

shooting_details.three_point: Legit elite shooter above 40% on high volume, with range and quick release.
shooting_details.midrange: Strong pull-up game, especially when defenses chase him off the line.
shooting_details.free_throws: Very reliable, can close games at the line.

defense_profile.on_ball: Competitive and smart but limited by size; can stay in front of many college guards, will struggle vs elite athletes and bigger guards.
defense_profile.off_ball: High IQ, good positioning, anticipates actions and can take charges.
defense_profile.switch_ability: Limited to 1s and some small 2s; mismatch vs wings.
defense_profile.playmaking_defense: More positional than gambling; some steals by anticipation, good defensive rebounding for size.

strengths: Elite three-point shooter on volume
Top-tier pick-and-roll decision maker
Very low turnover rate relative to usage
High feel for the game, leadership and toughness
Can play on or off the ball thanks to shooting
weaknesses: Height and length are significant constraints at pro level
Rim finishing versus elite shot blockers will be challenging
Can be targeted in switches defensively
Relies heavily on system and spacing – manje efektan u haotičnim ekipama

development_projection.months_12: Završava NCAA karijeru kao jedan od najboljih PnR plejmejkera i šutera u ligi, profilisan kao pro-ready floor general.
development_projection.months_24: Početni pro nivo: starter ili glavni rotacioni PG u srednje jakim evropskim ligama, visoka efikasnost u PnR-u i šutu.
development_projection.months_36: Moguć EuroCup/BCL starter ili visokominutni backup u vrlo jakim ligama, ako defanzivno preživi i zadrži 40%+ šut za tri.

best_systems: Structured European-style offenses with heavy PnR usage
Teams with strong bigs and shooters koji mogu da koriste njegov playmaking
Coaches who value discipline and high IQ over raw athleticism
poor_fits: Switch-heavy defenses on highest European level
Teams that expect PG to be primary rim-attack scorer
Low-spacing, chaotic teams without clear offensive structure

archetype: explosive downhill point guard and defensive guard with questionable 3P shooting
summary: Eksplozivan slasher PG sa odličnom odbranom i energijom. Najbolji kada napada reket i igra agresivnu POA odbranu. Najveći upitnik za pro nivo je stabilnost šuta za tri i halfcourt organizacija na najvišem nivou.

primary_ways_of_scoring: transition attacks off steals or quick outlets
offense_profile.shot_creation: Good self-creator versus average defenders, especially attacking closeouts and in PnR when he can turn the corner.
offense_profile.pnr_usage: Uses PnR to get downhill; capable passer to roller and spot-up shooters but not an elite manipulator like pure floor generals.
offense_profile.finishing_at_rim: Very good at college level vs most bigs, uses strength and body control, but relies more on speed than length.

shooting_details.three_point: Streaky; currently below pro-ideal, needs work on consistency and confidence.
shooting_details.midrange: Solid pull-up and floater package from 3–5 meters.
shooting_details.free_throws: Respectable FT shooter; može da kazni faulove.

defense_profile.on_ball: Aggressive, physical and quick laterally, can disrupt opposing PGs and pressure full court.
defense_profile.off_ball: Good anticipation in passing lanes, rotates with energy, can over-gamble at times.
defense_profile.switch_ability: Best vs 1s and some 2s; undersized for wings.
defense_profile.playmaking_defense: Generates steals and deflections; može pokrenuti tranziciju iz odbrane.

strengths: Explosive first step and strong downhill game
High motor and defensive intensity
Solid PnR passing and reading rollers
Can change momentum of the game with energy
Comfortable in up-tempo systems and in transition
weaknesses: Below-average three-point shooter for pro PG standards
Not a pure control-type PG, decision making još varira
Height and length limit switching and finishing vs elite size
Može biti streaky u napadu ako se oslanja samo na ulaz

development_projection.months_12: Stabilan starter ili ključni guard u UCLA, 11–14 PPG i 4–5 APG, uz fokus na poboljšanje šuta za tri.
development_projection.months_24: Rani pro nivo kao rotacioni PG/CG u srednjim evropskim ligama, pre svega kao slasher/defensive guard.
development_projection.months_36: Ako šut za tri dođe do 35–37%, može biti starter u solidnim evropskim ligama i BCL/EuroCup rotacioni igrač; bez šuterskog skoka ostaje spark-plug guard i defanzivni specijalista.

best_systems: Up-tempo teams that push transition and value guard pressure
Defensive-minded coaches who cene agresivnost i POA odbranu
Teams with good spacing and shooters da otvore reket za njegove ulaze
Two-guard lineups gde drugi bek može biti stabilniji šuter/organizator
poor_fits: Teams requiring elite 3P shooting from the PG position
Slow-paced halfcourt-only offenses bez tranzicije
Systems that demand heavy switch defense against larger wings

archetype: defense-first, physically strong point guard with high IQ and limited 3P shooting
summary: Vrlo snažan, tough two-way PG, jedan od najboljih defanzivnih plejmejkera u NCAA. Napada reket fizički, dobro kreira iz ulaza, ima visok košarkaški IQ. Najveći limitator je šut za tri i free throw mehanika.

primary_ways_of_scoring: post-up vs smaller guards in some sets
offense_profile.shot_creation: Creates advantages primarily with strength and paint touches, less with pure shake or step-backs.
offense_profile.pnr_usage: Functional PnR handler who can hit roller and simple kick-outs; more north-south than manipulator.
offense_profile.finishing_at_rim: Very strong through contact, good balance and body control. Effective vs most college bigs.

shooting_details.three_point: Below ideal, around low 30s; defenses dare him to shoot and go under.
shooting_details.free_throws: FT% is concern – mora da popravi mehaniku za pro nivo.

defense_profile.on_ball: Elite POA defender; strong, physical, excellent stance and slides, bothers ball handlers consistently.
defense_profile.off_ball: Excellent anticipation and team defense, high steal rate, very active hands.
defense_profile.switch_ability: Can guard 1–2 and some 3s thanks to strength, but limited vs taller wings at pro level.
defense_profile.playmaking_defense: Generates turnovers, deflections, and leads fast breaks from steals.

strengths: Elite point-of-attack defense
Strong, physical guard with great motor
High defensive IQ and anticipation
Good PnR passing and decision making
Toughness and leadership profile
weaknesses: Inconsistent three-point shooting
Below-average FT shooting for a guard
Limited size vs pro-level wings
Not a high-level isolation creator
Offense heavily driven by paint touches, less by pull-up shooting

development_projection.months_12: Ostaje defanzivni stub Iowa State-a, uz pokušaj da podigne 3PT i FT procente.
development_projection.months_24: Ulazak u profesionalne lige kao defense-first PG u ABA, ProA, LEB Oro, Poljska itd.
development_projection.months_36: Ako šut dođe do 35%+ za tri i stabilnije FT, može biti startni PG u jakim evropskim ligama; bez šuterskog napretka ostaje high-level defanzivni specijalista u srednjim ligama.

best_systems: Defensive-minded teams that build identity on pressure and toughness
Offenses where PG can attack the paint и ima šutere oko sebe
Coaches who value low-turnover, defense-first guards
poor_fits: Teams that require elite 3P shooting from PG
Five-out systems where non-shooting PG is huge spacing liability
Squads expecting PG to be high-usage isolation scorer

archetype: athletic scoring combo guard with downhill slashing and developing shooting/playmaking
summary: Mladi, eksplozivan combo guard koji može igrati i 1 i 2. Najjači je kao slasher i transition napadač, uz perspektivu da razvije dobar šut i PnR igru. Projekat sa visokim upside-om ako šut i decision-making napreduju.

offense_profile.shot_creation: Capable of creating his own shot vs most college defenders, especially in semi-transition and against tilted defenses.
offense_profile.pnr_usage: Functional PnR handler; can improve at reading second and third level of defense.
offense_profile.finishing_at_rim: Good vertical pop and body control, can finish with contact; needs more craft vs set rim protectors.

shooting_details.three_point: Developing; mechanics okay but consistency not proven on high volume.
shooting_details.midrange: Comfortable with pull-ups and rhythm shots after 1–2 dribbles.
shooting_details.free_throws: Solid base, suggests potential for shooting improvement.

defense_profile.on_ball: Good athlete capable of staying in front of most guards when engaged.
defense_profile.off_ball: Still learning rotations and consistency; can use length better in passing lanes.
defense_profile.switch_ability: Can guard 1s and smaller 2s; may grow into guarding some bigger wings as strength improves.
defense_profile.playmaking_defense: Some steals by activity and athleticism rather than pure anticipation.

strengths: Athletic downhill slasher
Combo-guard versatility (može igrati i 1 i 2)
Good mid-range and pull-up potential
High motor and competitiveness
Upside as both scorer and secondary creator
weaknesses: Three-point shooting consistency is unproven
Decision-making i čitanje kompleksnijih PnR situacija još su u razvoju
Još nema definisanu rolu (PG vs SG) na pro nivou
Defanzivna disciplina ponekad oscilira

development_projection.months_12: Stabilizacija uloge u Arizona State kao rotation guard, sa fokusom na šut i PnR reads.
development_projection.months_24: Rani pro nivo kao scoring combo guard u ligama srednje snage, pre svega kao energija i slasher.
development_projection.months_36: Ako šut dođe u rang 36–38% za tri i decision-making se popravi, može biti startni guard u dobrim evropskim ligama; u suprotnom ostaje 'spark plug' rotacioni igrač.

best_systems: Teams that play uptempo and value guard drives
Squads with structured PnR sets but slobodom za combo guardove
Rosters that already have stabilnog 'pure PG' pa on može više da bude scorer
poor_fits: Timovi koji očekuju od njega da bude čist, high-level floor general odmah
Sistemi bez spacinga gde se guši njegov ulaz
Ekipe koje zahtevaju elitnog šutera na bek poziciji

archetype: high-motor defensive combo guard and slasher with streaky shooting
summary: Eksplozivan combo guard sa brutalnom energijom u odbrani, sjajnom brzinom i dobrim downhill scoringom. Najveća vrednost dolazi iz odbrane i tranzicije. Šut za tri i playmaking kao primary PG još uvek nisu na elitnom nivou.

primary_ways_of_scoring: downhill drives in semi-transition and against closeouts
pull-up and midrange jumpers when hot
offense_profile.shot_creation: Capable of creating his own shot vs many college defenders through speed and aggression, less through craft.
offense_profile.pnr_usage: Can run PnR but more as a scoring guard than as pure playmaker.
offense_profile.finishing_at_rim: Very strong; explosive first step and good body control, thrives vs rotating defenses.

shooting_details.three_point: Approximately low-to-mid 30s; streaky and still developing.
shooting_details.midrange: Capable pull-up shooter when in rhythm.

defense_profile.on_ball: Elite defensive intensity, pressures the ball 94 feet, great lateral quickness.
defense_profile.off_ball: Good anticipation of passing lanes, can over-gamble but overall impact is positive.
defense_profile.switch_ability: Can defend 1s and some 2s; undersized for bigger wings.
defense_profile.playmaking_defense: Generates steals and deflections, fuels transition game.

strengths: Top-tier defensive motor and on-ball pressure
Explosive north-south athlete
Very good transition scorer
Emotional and energetski lider na parketu
Fits modern role of energy guard off the bench
weaknesses: Three-point shooting not yet stable enough for primary guard role at high pro level
Not a pure floor general; playmaking is secondary
Height limits versatility in switch-heavy schemes
Može da se zaleti u zatvorene linije i forsira teške šuteve kad je previše napaljen

development_projection.months_12: Postaje jedan od ključnih guardova Cincinnati tima, 12–14 PPG, ~2 SPG i definisana uloga 'two-way energy guard'.
development_projection.months_24: Rani pro nivo u srednjim ligama kao high-energy combo guard i defanzivni specijalista.
development_projection.months_36: Ako šut za tri poraste na 36–38% i playmaking se popravi, može biti starter u boljim ligama i BCL ekipama; ako ne, ostaje vrlo vredan rotacioni 'stopper' guard.

best_systems: High-tempo, defense-first teams that press and run
Squads that need energy guard to change rhythm from the bench
Lineups with another, more stable playmaker so he can focus na odbranu i napad
poor_fits: Teams expecting a tall, switchable PG/SG defender vs 1–3
Systems that require elite C&S shooting from both guards
Very slow, halfcourt-only offenses

archetype: athletic two-way slashing wing guard with developing shooting and decision-making
summary: Snažan, eksplozivan krilni bek sa velikim upside-om: može da napada obruč, da brani više pozicija i ima fizičke alate za modernog 3&D/driver igrača. Šut za tri i decision-making su ključne razvojne tačke.

primary_ways_of_scoring: transition scoring after steals or long rebounds
offense_profile.shot_creation: Can create his own shot versus many defenders through speed and strength, particularly in straight-line drives and simple pull-ups.
offense_profile.pnr_usage: Limited as primary PnR handler for now; more effective as secondary creator or attacking off second-side actions.
offense_profile.finishing_at_rim: Very good; explosive leaper with strong body, comfortable finishing through contact and in traffic.

shooting_details.three_point: Developing; around 30–34% range, streaky but promising if mechanics stabilize.
shooting_details.midrange: Comfortable rising up into pull-ups from 2–3 dribbles.
shooting_details.free_throws: Solid FT touch, supports upside as shooter.

defense_profile.on_ball: Potentially high-level wing defender, with length, lateral quickness and strength to guard 1–3 at college level.
defense_profile.off_ball: Still learning rotations, can over-gamble but tools allow for good recovery.
defense_profile.switch_ability: Can switch across 1–3, maybe even smaller 4s at some pro levels.
defense_profile.playmaking_defense: Generates steals from anticipation and athletic closeouts.

strengths: High-level athleticism and physical tools
Two-way potential as slasher and defender
Ability to pressure the rim and draw help
Solid midrange scoring toolkit
Frame and length ideal for modern wing guard roles
weaknesses: Inconsistent three-point shooting
Raw decision-making as on-ball creator
Still learning halfcourt discipline and when to slow down
Not yet a reliable primary playmaker

development_projection.months_12: Postaje važan rotacioni igrač i potencijalni starter u Duquesne, uz rast uloge kao slasher/defender.
development_projection.months_24: Početak pro karijere kao athletic 3&D/slashing wing u srednjim ligama (Belgija/Holandija, Poljska, ABA2 itd.).
development_projection.months_36: Ako šut za tri ode na 35–37% i decision-making napreduje, može postati starter u jakim evropskim ligama; bez šuterskog skoka ostaje vredan role player kao defanzivac i slasher.

best_systems: Switch-heavy defensive schemes that use wings to guard 1–3
Transition-oriented offenses that run off stops
Teams with strong primary PG so he can focus on slashing and defense
poor_fits: Teams that need pure shooters at the 2/3 spot
Systems that require wing to be primary PnR creator
Very slow, halfcourt-only offenses without much transition play
